author: julianfoad
msg: * subversion/libsvn_wc/workqueue.c
(run_postupgrade): Remove an unused variable. A follow-up to r1484092.

author: philharveyonline
msg: PROTON-225: added new methods for Transport input and output which return ByteBuffers owned by Transport.
In contrast, the old deprecated input/output methods used byte arrays owned by the CLIENT.
Summary of changes:
- added new Transport methods: getInputBuffer, processInput, getOutputBuffer and outputProcessed
- the old Transport input/output methods are now deprecated
- the Python-to-proton-j binding now uses the new methods (note that the Python-to-proton-c binding still uses the old functions)
- added new methods to JNITransport. Implemented by calling the existing input/output methods for now.
- "tests" module now depends on proton-j-impl so it can use its encoder, decoder and test classes.
- improve exception handling in messenger.py
- consolidated all Python test pump functions
- increased ssl python test coverage to test ssl connection when client is allowed to connect unsecurely
- added configuration options to JythonTest allowing repeated test invocation and colorized output to be switched on.
Work done by Keith Wall <kwall@apache.org> and me.

author: rgoers
msg: Use Berkeley DB transactions. Fix logic to wait for batch or delay time to expire
